name: BetterDiscord
description: Allows you to use BetterDiscord on web. Some plugins might not be working correctly. Just let me know and i try to fix that
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://cdn.statically.io/gh/m3t4f1v3/BdBrowser/master/dist/*; object-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://github.com/*; script-src 'self' https://codemirror.net/*
